reviewText: Such a quaint little doc. So nice that is was so focused on one area - this way we can see not only the landscapes, but also go into its history. The mix of the social and the natural is a very enjoyable mix.
Magnificent view with wonderful sense of multiple islands, recommended!
I was disappointed. I'm sure it probably gave the time of the DVD in the promo but I didn't notice, however, I don't think a 10 minute film was worth that price.
good... gave more a history which is great.  detailed and interesting
very limited, repetitious scenery and commentary

Most of the TravelVideoStore videos I've seen come across as fairly low-budget productions, and this is another one.  The scenery of Ha Long Bay is beautiful, but this video felt like 11 minutes of pretty much the same thing.  Not bad, but I think it could have been a lot more interesting.  At least it's short.
